/* com.biz.framework.mapper.pages.ApplypaymentapprmngMapper.findApplypaymentmngList */
SELECT ST.SETTLEMENT_SEQ, ST.PROD_ID, PR.PROD_NAME, ST.USER_ID, EP.EMP_NAME, ST.CUST_ID, CU.CUST_NAME, ST.REQ_DATE, ST.PROD_AMT, ST.SALE_AMT, ST.INFLOW_CNT, ST.SALE_TOTAL_AMT, -- ST.REQ_GUBUN, ST.EXPECT_AMT, ST.EXPECT_RATE_AMT, DATE_FORMAT(ST.DATE_WORK_FROM, '%Y-%m-%d') AS DATE_WORK_FROM, DATE_FORMAT(ST.DATE_WORK_TO, '%Y-%m-%d') AS DATE_WORK_TO, ST.WORK_DAY, IFNULL(ST.INCENTIVE_RATE, 0) AS INCENTIVE_RATE, ST.CONFIRM_AMT, ST.CONFIRM_RATE_AMT, ST.REFUND_IND, ST.ATCH_ID, CASE WHEN ST.REFUND_IND IS NOT NULL THEN '환불요청' ELSE '정산요청' END AS REQ_GUBUN, ST.APPLY_STATUS, CD.CODE_NAME AS STATUS_NAME, ST.TAX_IND, ST.PAY_YM FROM SETTLEMENT ST LEFT JOIN TB_CUSTOMER CU ON ST.CUST_ID = CU.BIZ_NO LEFT JOIN TB_PRODUCTS PR ON ST.PROD_ID = PR.PROD_ID AND DATE_FORMAT(ST.REQ_DATE, '%Y%m%d') BETWEEN PR.EFF_DATE_FROM AND PR.EFF_DATE_TO LEFT JOIN TB_EMP EP ON ST.USER_ID = EP.EMP_ID LEFT JOIN CDBASE CD ON CD.PATTERN_CODE = 'SE02' AND ST.APPLY_STATUS = CD.BASE_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND (DATE_FORMAT(#{searchStartDate} , '%Y%m%d') <= ST.DATE_WORK_FROM) AND (DATE_FORMAT(#{searchEndDate} , '%Y%m%d') >= ST.DATE_WORK_TO)
AND PR.PROD_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{prodName} ,'%')
AND EP.EMP_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{empName} ,'%')
AND CU.CUST_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{custName} ,'%')
mapper.insert: /* com.biz.framework.mapper.pages.ApplypaymentapprmngMapper.confirmApplypayment */ UPDATE SETTLEMENT SET CONFIRM_AMT = #{confirmAmt}, CONFIRM_RATE_AMT = #{confirmRateAmt}, SAVE_MILEAGE = #{saveMileage}, STATUS = '2' WHERE SETTLEMENT_SEQ = #{settlementSeq}

/* com.biz.framework.mapper.pages.ApplypaymentapprmngMapper.confirmApplypayment */ UPDATE SETTLEMENT SET CONFIRM_AMT = 0, CONFIRM_RATE_AMT = 0, SAVE_MILEAGE = 0, STATUS = '3' WHERE SETTLEMENT_SEQ = #{settlementSeq}
